body.description: Creme of Nature Mango And Shea Butter Ultra Moisturizing Leave-in Conditioner, Conditions and softens while providing protection. Conditioner deeply moisturizes and softens hair while adding shine. Ultra-moisturizing formula to soften dehydrated hair. Easy to use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About us The Creme of Nature brand includes a wide range of product choices to help you achieve the look you want in the healthiest, most nourishing way possible. Argan Oil from Morocco Experience the luxury of Argan Oil, a precious oil found only in Morocco, that revitalizes, protects and adds Exotic Shine. This new expansion to Creme of Nature offers styling products, hair color, shampoos and treatments. Natural Ingredients Our signature line of shampoo, conditioners and treatments with Natural Ingredients, including nourishing Coconut Milk, Mango and Shea Butter, and Acai Berry and Keratin. Moisture-rich hair color also offers rich, long-lasting color with shine that is ammonia-free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leave in conditioner
reviews.reviewText: Don't only is it a leave in conditioner, it promotes the natural curl of my hair. It doesn't dry out once applied, it eliminates the need for additional moisturizers, and it smells fantastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You cannot lose with this formula
reviews.reviewText: Amazing product. Smells amazing. Leaves your hair feeling so soft and smooth. Definitely wish there was an entire line in this formula.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Leave in
reviews.reviewText: Very nice scentLeaves hair soft and moisturizer

reviews.reviewText: This product is great! It works great in my hair and it smells good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing, feels and smells great
reviews.reviewText: Really like that my hair and scalp feel and look more moisturized. Will buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for other leave in conditioners to replace the spots of my fav leave in conditioners when they're low and I need to replace them. This leave in softens abd detangles the hair. For me it acts as a primer for my hair where I need a styler but never the less it smells like mangos and retails for 5 dollars. I am high porosity 4a 4b medium density with fine strands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells good. Leaves my hair soft and manageable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very hydrating for type 4 hair and smells lovely . Lasts long and great for detangling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 6, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I want to use this product for the rest of my life.I have 4a/4b low porosity hair and nothing melts into my hair. Every products sits on top of my hair and eventually dries two days later. Every product flakes or leaves white residue. I was hopeless until I found this product. As soon as I applied this leave-in, it melted into my hair straight away and dries within 5-10 minutes.HAVE YOU EVER BOUGHT A LEAVE-IN THAT DRIES IN UNDER 10 MINUTES?!This is perfect to use in the mornings especially when you're in a rush to get work/school, etc. You don't have to wait 30 minutes for it to dry, you can just use it and go. No flakes, no residue.Tips:- Use on wet or damp hair. (Can use on dry hair but it wont tame frizz as well. Regardless, using it on dry hair will not leave you with any residue)- Use sparingly, a little goes a long way.- Buy two bottles if you can, so you don't have to worry about it running out- Can apply on roots and ends without any shrinkage woahhhh- Smell is strong but wares off after 30 mins

As a black woman w/ super curly hair, it's hard to find a product that adequately moisturizes my hair. I've tried a lot of different kinds of leave ins but they mostly dry out my hair & make it hard. I loved this from the moment I tried it cause aside from smelling amazing (wish it was edible lol), it actually works. Having black hair, I can't be washing my hair everyday so when it comes to refreshing my curls, I need something that will put the moisture back in my hair during mid week stylings & such. I've been using Creme of Nature products for yrs but this leave in is my new favorite 1...it makes my hair so soft & my curls feel lush...I can run my fingers through my hair w/out having to use a comb so I guess this detangles too...It's like the life is being put back in my curls. A little really goes a long way w/ this stuff...I have a lot of hair but I only use about a quarter sized amount & that's enough to get the job done. I swear since using this I've had little to no breakage & my hair is shinier than ever. I don't know where this stuff has been my whole life but I'm glad I found it now.
